item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.QCRIDXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9C Indonesia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9C Indonesia

Codename: angelica

Version: V12.0.3.0.QCRIDXM | 10.0

Size: 3.2 GB

MD5: d952f0805a190eeba667679edad48601

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
